I guess I'll let you know what this is about. Sam Neill is in it. Thats about all I know about it.

The Dragon Pearl - formerly called The Last Dragon - tells the story of a young boy, John, played by Louis Corbett (The King, Bastard Boys ), who travels to China to visit his father, Dr Chase, on a dig and inadvertently discovers a real-life Chinese dragon.
